thread.title: Perrie Edwards shares romantic snap of boyfriend Oxlade-Chamberlain proving their relationship is very much still on
thread.title_full: Perrie Edwards shares romantic snap of boyfriend Oxlade-Chamberlain proving their relationship is very much still on

author: mirror
title: Perrie Edwards shares romantic snap of boyfriend Oxlade-Chamberlain proving their relationship is very much still on
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Little Mix vixen Perrie Edwards has smashed rumours she is singlem by sharing a romantic throwback snap of footballer boyfriend Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain. 
The girl band, who are currently supporting Ariana Grande on tour in the US, shared the kissing picture of the pair kissing in front of the Eiffel Tower in Paris with the simple caption: "Him." 
It isn't clear when the snap was taken but the couple look very much in love in the romantic snap against the glittering lights of the iconic building. 
Fans were overjoyed the pair were still an item after Perrie, 23, deleted the only snap of the footballer from her Instagram. Perrie and Alex are very much still on by the looks of things (Photo: perrieedwards/Instagram) Perrie deleted this snap - fans thought the romance had died a death (Photo: Instagram/PerrieEdwards) 
Just a few weeks back she had made their romance 'Insta-official' when she uploaded a sweet snap of the Arsenal footballer as he sat next to their dogs at the dinner table. Read More Leigh-Anne Pinnock shuts down haters over skimpy stage outfits: "We're all so body confident!" 
The photo, that gained a lot of attention from Perrie's followers, has now been deleted. 
Eagled eyed Little Mix fans took to Twitter to speculate whether this means the couple have spilt and questioned the reasons why Perrie would deleted the adorable photograph. 
One fan tweeted: "Soooo, perrie deleted alex's picture on her IG, y tho #BRITVIDLITTLEMIX " 
Another expressed her sadness at the situation: "Perrie deleted the photo of her dogs and Alex from her Instagram :(" Perrie Edwards revealed her new hair yesterday (Photo: Instagram) Alex famously plays for Arsenal (Photo: AFP/Getty Images) Read More 
Alex and Perrie have reportedly been dating since November last year and were keen to take things slow - especially after her messy spilt with ex-fiance Zayn Malik in 2015. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
